projects.title: Rest Country Display
projects.description: Displaying all the countries with help of rest country api. I made this project to learn basic react hook & scss 7-in-1 architecture.

projects.title: Movie Manager
projects.description: A Movie listing web app with sharing wishlist feature. I made this to learn Remix and styled-components.

projects.title: Letterio
projects.description: Browse and Send anonymous letters with ease on this website. I was trying out some light weight js and this was the end result.

projects.title: Classify Email
projects.description: Use GPT-4o to classify your gmail emails and filter them accordingly. I made this project to learn about GPT4o and gmail api. You will have to use your own open ai api key to access the app.

projects.title: Optician's Invoice
projects.description: A invoice app for any optician to generate order, invoice, prescription and send it to customers.
